title: New: Mausi – My Friend Has A Swimming Pool
body:
I’ve been waiting to hear a studio version of this track for a while now, and it doesn’t disappoint.

A key feature of their electrifying live sets, _My Friend Has A Swimming Pool_ is one of the most danceable tracks of the summer. Expect to hear this at every festival over the summer.
